LanguageData.VWE_SkeletonizedFrame.label: skeletonized frame
LanguageData.VWE_SkeletonizedFrame.description: This weapon has had non-essential metal drilled out to drastically reduce weight. It increases the user's movement speed, but the structural integrity is compromised, lowering the weapon's maximum durability.
LanguageData.VWE_WeightedStock.label: weighted stock
LanguageData.VWE_WeightedStock.description: This weapon features a reinforced, heavy stock designed for bludgeoning. It significantly increases melee damage and stun chance, but the added weight increases aiming time.
LanguageData.VWE_PortedBarrel.label: ported barrel
LanguageData.VWE_PortedBarrel.description: This weapon has gas vents drilled near the muzzle to counteract recoil. It reduces the cooldown time between shots, allowing for faster sustained fire, but slightly reduces maximum range.
LanguageData.VWE_IlluminatedSights.label: illuminated sights
LanguageData.VWE_IlluminatedSights.description: This weapon is fitted with self-illuminating sights. It provides a consistent accuracy increase across all ranges, particularly useful in poor lighting conditions.
LanguageData.VWE_MatchTrigger.label: match trigger
LanguageData.VWE_MatchTrigger.description: This weapon features a finely tuned, sensitive trigger mechanism. It improves accuracy at medium and long ranges, but requires a deliberate, gentle squeeze, which slightly increases aiming time.
LanguageData.VWE_FireSelector.label: fire selector
LanguageData.VWE_FireSelector.description: This weapon has been modified to fire controlled, semi-automatic shots rather than fully automatic sprays. It fires fewer shots per burst, but gains a massive accuracy boost at medium and long ranges.
LanguageData.VWE_Akimbo.label: akimbo
LanguageData.VWE_Akimbo.description: This weapon is paired with a matching duplicate, allowing the colonist to dual-wield. It doubles the number of rounds fired in a burst and doubles the fire rate, but aiming two weapons simultaneously significantly reduces accuracy.
